vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17;
son of: Mered (H4778) and Bithiah (H1332);
brother of: Miriam (H4813H) and Shammai (H8060I);
half-brother of: Jered (H3382H)(?), Heber (H2268I)(?) and Jekuthiel (H3354)(?); married to Hodiah (H1940)(?);
father of: son_of_Hodiah (H3431H)(?)
§ Ishbah = "he will praise"
father of Eshtemoa and descendant of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Méred; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
益巴 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "他會頌讚"
以實提摩之父, 猶大的子孫. #代上 4:17|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
益巴 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "他会颂赞"
以实提摩之父, 犹大的子孙. #代上 4:17|
